name: Diane Multi-Layer Cotton Rounds, 100 count, 100% Pure Cotton, Premium, Hypoallergenic, Biodegradable, Strong and Durable Makeup and Nail Polish Removal Wipes
short_description: 100% PURE COTTON: Diane cotton rounds are made of 100% pure cotton and are vegan, cruelty free, hypoallergenic, chlorine and fragrance-free. 1 package contains 100 rounds. Each round measures 2.4 inches in diameter and can be used for a variety of personal needs for women, men, kids, and babies.
SOFT AND GENTLE: The pure cotton rounds are soft and delicate for safely cleansing the skin after minor wounds and can be used for dressing.
MULTI-LAYER: Each cotton square is multi-layer making it extra absorbent, durable, and plush.

BEST USES: Our cotton square works great at removing makeup, applying toners, creams, lotions, gels, and other cosmetic products to face and skin. Cotton squares also have less lint than cotton balls making them ideal to remove and touch up nail polish.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Diane disposable cotton products are biodegradable, and our packaging is reusable and recyclable.
product_description: Diane Cotton Rounds can be used for personal hygiene or first aid. Our cotton rounds are multi-layered with a super soft texture and will not leave behind debris that may clog your pores or cause acne and irritation. Our cotton rounds can be used to remove makeup and impurities like pollution from your skin, apply astringents or lotion. Since they have less lint than cotton balls, these cotton rounds are ideal for removing old and unwanted nail polish. They can even be used for soaking up blood from minor cuts or scrapes. To use for face cleansing, including eye makeup and mascara removal, simply add a dime-sized amount of makeup remover to a cotton pad. Close eyes, and gently wipe lids, lashes and lips. For nail polish removal, soak cotton pad in nail polish remover, and gently wipe nail polish off nails. Every medicine cabinet should have cotton rounds, as it’s a versatile, multifunctional beauty tool and accessory. Diane is a multicategory, inclusive beauty brand for women and men of all ages offering affordable everyday essentials. Since 1954, Diane has been an icon in the beauty industry and focused on one thing: understanding the needs our diverse consumer by offering thoughtful, quality beauty products. We hope you love finding new ways to invigorate your beauty routine and that we help make it fun, affordable, and easy.

Whether for daily delicate skincare or thorough gentle makeup removal, they gently cleanse the skin. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Exceptional absorbency. These cotton pads quickly absorb cosmetics, skincare products, and cleansers, gently cleansing the skin with just a light swipe. From morning to night, they are your reliable partner in pursuing an efficient and high-quality lifestyle, and an indispensable guardian of your beauty routine.

The other side has a smooth, delicate texture, ideal for applying serums, lotions, or creams, gently adhering to the skin's texture to promote deep absorption of active ingredients.
